message: Let's be practical, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share!
Alice, I'm willing to be reasonable, but your previous offer wasn't fair. This is a more balanced split that reflects the time pressure we both face.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is my final offer - take it or leave it!
Alice, this is the best I can offer.  Accepting this offer ensures we both walk away with something substantial.
